channel.title: Pm work like rs help
channel.description:
how wuld i make pm being on/off/friends work correctly? idk i saw delta have it as an update, i looked into it, culdn't c any reason why it wuldn't work
When you have private chat on, everyone can message you. When you have private chat on friends, only friends can see you online and message you. When you have private chat off, everyone will see you as offline and cannot message you.
halp? :P
